website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive set of two D-rings with a weight capacity that is lower than some of the competition.
pros: Suitable for both towing and recovery
you can use tow straps, tree savers, and more with them
Shiny black surface looks good and is coated to prevent rust
cons: These rings may make more noise than some others

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with these for the price the really high quality using a few times to pull vehicles never had an issue just as good as the ones I buy in the store for way more money
customer_reviews.author: tombj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for the enormous safety chain slots on my new 2017 F250
customer_reviews.author: Fleming23

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with a 45,000 lb tow strap I used to work at a company that made similar products to this these. shackles are pretty heavy-duty you would have to put some serious serious pressure to actually bend the middle of it the only thing that I am kind of worried about is the bolt that screws into the bottom side it feels to me like if you got seriously stuck and had to get yanked out the threads would seize(that has NOT happened) and there's some sharp slag around the inside of where it threads in but it's definitely a sturdy product and it should work for its purpose
customer_reviews.author: TheUltimateBohab

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them yet for towing with our '17 F-250 ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet for towing with our '17 F-250 because winter won't go away here. They seem beefy though and I've already tested them in the hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Used these twice pulling tree out. Look great and price was fantastic. Would but again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: PA Lineman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality very well made!
customer_reviews.text: These are stout D-rings would handle just about anything you would need to pull
customer_reviews.author: nikkiB

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job. Must have for the off beaten path.
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to use a buddies shackles to save a wayward Jeep owner in some deep mud. Made me buy these for myself. First trip out actually put these to use, their 30’ tow strap, and tow hitch shackle adapter to use to rescue another wayward Jeep owner. Did the trick both times never concerned with any of the parts not doing their job. The best part didn’t have to sell the first born to make it happen. Would love a USA made product but price, and profit over production wins out. Thanks China.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and can be used for many purposes. I used them to tow my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jrineck

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use these yet. I bought them to go along with a Tow Strap in case I go off the road this winter. They are heavy and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: vicmoose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the spare tire area of my Subaru and fit the eye of the tow hook
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Amazing strength!
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy duty in every way. Really easy to use & quite versatile for securing to various hookups. Used for skidding a 2000lb log with this hooked to a heavy duty tow strap and it went on in seconds and showed no wear or tear after easily pulling massive log.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.J.B

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a single shackle for my winch cable to attach a tree saver for my ATV. I couldn't really find just 1 so I bought this set. They are bigger than I expected. They are heavy and seem to be of good quality. They would look nice on a vehicle if that is your intention. For my needs, I think they will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin from WV

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing or Handling Defects
customer_reviews.text: The picture is of the first pair of bow shackles from Ohuhu, which arrived used or damaged and were returned for a replacement pair. The second pair arrived in better condition but still with areas of chipped paint. The price is right but the quality is lacking. I hope that they are truly rated for a Working Load Limit, as claimed of, 4.75 tons.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Riversong

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Shackles are made durable. I don't foresee any problems in the future. I won't be loading them up that heavily, but they will definitely serve their purpose. I am very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: curlyq

customer_reviews.title: Good set of shackles
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to keep as a backup in my wife's SUV, seems durable and well made, only time will tell, but in comparison to my other ones, they seem just fine, should be fine under conditions of what it could possible face.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a strong shackle. The pin on mine was slightly larger than 3/4" with the paint, so I had to enlarge the hole in my drawbar slightly to be able to use. Not a big deal, and no reason to deduct a star.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched pair
customer_reviews.text: They seem well made so far. Though it's curious I received two different shackles apparently destined for different markets. One was as advertised while the other was 19mm - at least they're equivalent products with the same WLL (albeit one stamped as fraction and the other decimal).
customer_reviews.author: OBSSD

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very heavy duty shackle! I had issues drilling the 5/8 hole through 1/2 steel required for the pin, but that's not a dig on the shackle. Used them on the front of my tractor as tie-down points. Haven't tried them yet, but they certainly look and feel up to the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty D Rings great for my wrangler. I haven’t managed to try them for towing or winching but they are definitely strong and feel heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Yep, saved some money instead of buying them from HD or Lowes. They are fine... no problems.... Definitely heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Triangle NC

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: So pretty sturdy devices. Use as a shackle for overhead crane. And it picked up the front of my truck no issue.
customer_reviews.author: DF_EE

customer_reviews.title: They do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty shackle. I’ve put them to the test pulling trees and trucks. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Childs

customer_reviews.title: Good shackles
customer_reviews.text: Works right out the box, as it should be. Heavy shackle, much better price wise than purchased from local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: good paint tuff stuff
customer_reviews.text: straight forward on this one accurate description and the paint is quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed. Installed and already rusting within a week. All the talk about coating and durability is a joke
customer_reviews.author: clint maggard

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight shackles, still haven't used, but so far with only looks and weight they should preform well.
customer_reviews.author: Navyjuice

customer_reviews.title: Nice shackles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t put them to the test yet but they seem like a really good set. Look really good on my bumper and I’m sure they will more then do the job I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem tough. Hope I don't need to use them for towing. Cool look on my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: A recovery shackle at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I put these to use within a few days of them arriving. They worked great as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and must have around the farm
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, we use around the farm and they hold up to everything we've put them through.
customer_reviews.author: katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Big and strong
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how big these are...small pictures don’t do them justice. They seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: DCM

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat them for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for for less than what I thought it would cost.
customer_reviews.author: Red Hauler

customer_reviews.title: Solid 3/4” shackle
customer_reviews.text: Solid shackles. As advertised. Coating entact. Nice and clean. Screw pin turns well. Burly.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy D

customer_reviews.title: Look good and match.
customer_reviews.text: Both came in perfect condition. No scratches or signs of previous use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I won't break these like that cheap carabineer I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Desert ape

customer_reviews.title: These things are heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice powder coat, heavy duty. Might be a bit pricey but you won't find them cheaper with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pete from Mass

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Shackles are very sturdy and made of good quality, shipping had no problems and came in a good package!
customer_reviews.author: Vin1217

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Theses are grate , just was what I was looking for and works great Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RA48H

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got them on deal of the day for a good price fit and finish is a little ruff but the Function is is fine they seem HD. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Prososki

customer_reviews.title: Great looking D RIngs
customer_reviews.text: Not to bulky for their tow capacity. The painted glossy black looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost rust proof
customer_reviews.text: The little hole in the shackle rod isn't powder coated. Unfortunately, this has resulted in the shackle starting to rust out after a long, wet summer. Other than that, it's successfully pulled me out of a few jams so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Bienstock

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They do their job as far as pulling goes, but the “protective finish” is terrible. The coating started coming off after the first use, which was the day after unboxing. I reckon you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and tight threads
customer_reviews.text: I just used one to pull a tree up the hill after downing it. perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jimster

customer_reviews.title: They appear to be of good quality and I will certainly be buying more
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised. They appear to be of good quality and I will certainly be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: William Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made and the threads are butter smooth. I own a 6.4 so I hope I never have to use it lol
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These fit great in the small safety chain receptacles on my Ford F250. Well-built and pretty to look at, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Odum

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 19 f250 to hook trailer chains up. Fit fine
customer_reviews.author: Anger management

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to use them but seem very well made and sturdy. I’m sure once they get used the black paint will come off but I hope not. Other than that seems like they will be a good product
customer_reviews.author: Micheal wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deal I could find on 3/4 inch drings. They must be good people keep stealing them off my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Speckman

customer_reviews.title: Need to tighten regularly
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty product....make sure you regularly check for tightness as we've already lost one (or maybe it was stolen ??)
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Used to lift heavy farm implements on to a trailer with my tractor. Shackles were very handy when connecting lift straps. Well made and heavy duty. More than enough. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look good, seem sturdy and priced right. cant ask for much more
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Didn’t work for what I ordered them for pin was to big. But seem well made. I’m sure I will use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: but will work fine out in the woods using to connect straps and ...
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected, but will work fine out in the woods using to connect straps and snatch blocks for logging.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tough as hell for the price. Use themto pull out trucks that slide off the icy Alaskan roads. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do what they advertise
customer_reviews.text: Have used them twice so far to pull out stuck vehicles. Work as advetised
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rusher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Haven't put it to the test yet... but seem to be as described.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great product..solid
customer_reviews.text: Very good tobhelp extend your ford f250 trailer hooks from tow chain...
customer_reviews.author: Mountainman

customer_reviews.title: Order rubber isolaters separately
customer_reviews.text: Black paint scraped in areas and rubber isolaters to prevent vibrating noise does not come with them.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i havent used them yet , but they look to be heavyduty shackles.
customer_reviews.author: david moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised, Fit shackle mounts perfectly and has not chipped or rusted yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

product_meta.title: D Ring Shackles 3/4" 2 PACK, Ohuhu D Shackle Rugged 28.5 Ton (57,000 lbs) Maximum Break Strength, 4.75 Ton (9,500 Lbs) Capacity
feature_bullets: UNIVERSAL FIT: Fits most off-road vehicles with D-ring mounts (front/rear bumper) such as 4WD, SUV, Trucks, ATV, and UTV
HEAVY-DUTY DESIGN: Forged steel design with a 4.75-ton (9500 lbs.) towing and recovery capacity
PIN & SHACKLES INCLUDED: Equipped with a 3/4 inch D-ring shackles with industry grade 7/8 -inch pin ideal for winching, rigging and recovery
DURABLE FINISH: Smooth powder coated finish for a soft sleek surface as well as rust prevention
SAFE ATTACHMENT: Designed to allow for safe attachment points for straps compared to wrapping around the ball on the hitch, works well with tow straps, snatch straps, tree savers and snatch blocks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars354 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
